Question: Guess capitalized on this person's strong resemblance to Jayne Mansfield and put her in Jayne-inspired photo sessions.
Hints: Though she reportedly never lived with him, this person maintained that she loved her husband, and age did not matter to her.
Tabloids speculated that this person was under the influence of pills or some other controlled substance.
This person said she planned to be "the next Marilyn Monroe".
